home.metaDescription: DURŌ - gde je umetnost niche parfimerije uokvirena vrhunskim luksuzom. Zastupamo 25 najtraženijih umetničkih parfemskih kuća i niche brendova. U spektakularnom ambijentu kreiramo jedinstveno iskustvo za sve ljubitelje parfema.

story.metaDescription: DURŌ je luksuzna niche parfimerija u Beogradu. Zakoračite u riznicu lepote i sofisticiranosti - mesto gde svet autentičnih parfema, ukrašen prvoklasnom uslugom, postaje deo vaše stvarnosti.

brands.metaDescription: Otkrijte vrhunske niche brendove koji ekskluzivno zastupa naša parfimerija. Prepustite se čarima ove umetnosti i pronađite svoj omiljeni brend.

press.metaDescription: Budite u toku sa najnovijim vestima i događajima za iz sveta DURŌ Niche parfimerije.

contact.metaDescription: Stupite u kontakt sa nama. Naš tim je tu da vam pruži podršku, informacije i odgovori na sve vaše upite.

gallery.metaDescription: Naša luksuzna parfimerija u slikama. Upoznajte se sa jedinstvenom vizuelnom estetikom i uživajte u DURŌ konceptu.

giveaway.metaDescription: Uslovi i odredbe za našu uzbudljivu nagradnu igru. Prilika da osvojite sjajne nagrade iz DURŌ parfimerije.

story.title: Naša Priča
story.desc1: DURŌ je jedna od najluksuznijih niche parfimerija na svetu. Zastupamo 25 najtraženijih umetničkih parfemskih kuća. U spektakularnom ambijentu kreiramo jedinstveno iskustvo za sve ljubitelje parfema.
story.desc2: Zakoračite u riznicu lepote i sofisticiranosti - mesto gde svet autentičnih parfema, ukrašen prvoklasnom uslugom, postaje deo vaše stvarnosti.

boutique.title: Naša luksuzna parfimerija
boutique.desc1: DURŌ je luksuzna niche parfimerija u Beogradu. U našem elegantnom i sofisticiranom prostoru, svaki brend koji zastupamo ima posebno osmišljenu prezentaciju, dizajniranu sa pažnjom i predstavljenu tako da bi se stvorilo jedinstveno parfemsko putovanje. Od trenutka kada zakoračite u našu parfimeriju, bićete očarani jedinstvenim ambijentom i očaravajućom atmosferom. Vodeći vas kroz izuzetan izbor luksuznih niche parfema, naš tim je spreman da zajedno sa vama pronađe onaj koji savršeno odgovara vašem stilu i ličnosti.
boutique.desc2: Posetite nas danas i doživite neponovljivo iskustvo u našoj parfimeriji.

principle1.title: Niche parfemi
principle1.desc1: Naša selekcija parfema je pažljivo odabrana da odražava našu beskompromisnu strast prema izvrsnosti, majstorskoj veštini i kreativnosti.
principle1.desc2: Izabrali smo luksuzne niche parfemske kuće iz celog sveta koje krase jedinstvene priče i izuzetni parfemi.

principle2.title: Personalizovani pristup
principle2.desc1: Članovi našeg posvećenog tima razumeće vašu ličnost, stil i preferencije, te će vam ponuditi personalizovano i edukativno iskustvo kako biste otkrili vaš jedinstveni parfem.
principle2.desc2: Sa ličnim i posvećenim pristupom, prilagođavamo parfemsku avanturu vašim željama.

principle3.title: Luksuzni butik
principle3.desc1: Ekskluzivnost, sofisticiranost i jedinstveni stil. Od autentične atmosfere do posvećene usluge, vodimo računa o svakom detalju.
principle3.desc2: Kreirali smo parfemsko iskustvo koje nadmašuje tradicionalno iskustvo kupovine, ukrašeno luksuzom koji će vas oduševiti.

news1.title: Radno vreme za praznike: Uskrs 2023
news1.desc: Zbog nastupajućih praznika, radno vreme parfimerije je prilagođeno radnom vremenu TC „Galerija“ Beograd.

news2.title: Remek dela Milorada Bate Mihajlovića u DURŌ-u
news2.desc: Povodom svečanog otvaranja, sa ponosom najavljujemo javnu izložbu dva velika dela našeg poznatog slikara i akademika Milorada Bate Mihajlovića (1923 - 2011) u prostoru DURŌ niche parfimerije.

news3.title: Svečano otvaranje DURŌ niche parfimerije u Beogradu
news3.desc: Poštovane dame i gospodo, velika nam je čast i zadovoljstvo da sa vama podelimo radost povodom svečanog otvaranja naše nove parfimerije u TC „Galerija“ Beograd. U društvu dragih partnera, prijatelja, porodice i pravih zaljubljenika u parfeme, svečano smo presekli vrpcu i sa velikim oduševljenjem otvorili vrata DURŌ niche parfimerije!

news4.title: Veliko otvaranje DURŌ niche parfimerije će se održati 10/4
news4.desc: DURŌ niche parfimerija s ponosom najavljuje trenutak velikog otvaranja, označavajući rađanje jedinstvenog koncepta posvećenog umetnosti parfema u srcu Beograda. Čarobna atmosfera naše luksuzne parfimerije, smeštene u prestižnom TC „Galerija“, stvara nezaboravno estetsko iskustvo koje prevazilazi vreme i ostavlja neizbrisiv utisak.

nicePerfumery.desc1: „Monika Beluči, proslavljena italijanska glumica i ikona lepote i stila, je jednom prilikom izjavila: „Parfem je umetnost, to je oblik izražavanja koji govori jače od reči.“  DURŌ koncept je nastao na toj potrebi – da se široj publici predstavi ta specifična i očaravajuća umetnost. Naša priča je započela u srcu Crne Gore, u Podgorici, gde smo stvorili jedinstvenu oazu za ljubitelje parfema u okviru parfimerije Atelier Cologne Rajović. U luksuznom ambijentu u Bulevaru Džordža Vašingtona, pažljivo osmišljenom tako da ponudi neponovljivo iskustvo, naša prva parfimerija se brzo etablirala kao omiljeno mesto za sve zaljubljenike u parfeme u regionu.
nicePerfumery.desc2: Nismo stali na tome već smo sanjali velike snove, vođeni željom da podelimo našu strast i znanje sa širom publikom. Tako je nastao DURŌ koncept, kao i DURŌ niche parfimerija. 10.aprila 2023. godine na prestižnom događaju kojem je prisustvovalo više stotina zvanica, otvorili smo našu luksuznu parfimeriju u Beogradu, u okviru TC „Galerija“. Već u prvim danima nakon otvaranja, reakcije javnosti, publike i posetilaca bile su impresivne, čime je još jednom potvrđeno da u regionu postoji veliki potencijal za razvoj niche koncepta te da je Beogradu bilo potrebno mesto koje će okupiti sve one koji vole ovaj koncept i uživaju u parfemskoj umetnosti.
nicePerfumery.desc3: Na ovome ne planiramo da stanemo. Neprestano istražujemo i otkrivamo nove umetničke parfemske kuće, sa ciljem da našim posetiocima omogućimo da dožive svet najboljih i najtraženijih parfema na svetu. Naša sledeća destinacija je luksuzna marina Porto Montenegro u Tivtu, gde ćemo uskoro otvoriti svoja vrata i predstaviti naš jedinstveni koncept još većem broju ljubitelja parfema.
nicePerfumery.desc4: U parfimeriji DURŌ nismo fokusirani na uobičajeni komercijalni pristup prodaji parfema. Naš pristup je drugačiji. Mi nudimo jedinstveno i nezaboravno putovanje u svet čarobnih aroma i emocija, gde svaki parfem ima svoju priču. Zakoračite u riznicu lepote i sofisticiranosti - mesto gde svet autentičnih parfema, ukrašen prvoklasnom uslugom, postaje deo vaše stvarnosti.

approach.title: Parfemske Avanture
approach.desc1: Svi mi koji smo deo DURŌ koncepta verujemo da parfem predstavlja više od običnog mirisa. To je putovanje koje vas vodi kroz senzorno iskustvo, budeći emocije i sećanja. Zato smo se posvetili istraživanju najcenjenijih i najtraženijih umetničkih parfemskih kuća na svetu, koje ekskluzivno zastupamo na našem tržištu, ali i u regionu.
approach.desc2: Naša selekcija parfema pažljivo je odabrana na osnovu kvaliteta sastojaka, veštine izrade, kreativnosti i ekskluzivnosti. Svaki luksuzni brend koji zastupamo, ima svoju jedinstvenu priču, a mi smo posvećeni tome da sve te priče podelimo sa zaljubljenicima u parfeme. Neprestano istražujemo nove teritorije, upoznajemo i pronalazimo nove parfeme, noseve i koncepte vredne pažnje.
approach.desc3: Zato smo i kreirali parfemsko iskustvo koje nadmašuje tradicionalno iskustvo kupovine. Bez obzira da li ste prekaljeni poznavalac ili entuzijasta koji tek otpočinje svoj parfemski put, vodićemo vas kroz proces odabira savršenog parfema po vašoj meri. Želimo da podelimo naše znanje ali i našu strast prema parfemima, doprinoseći stvaranju zajednice ljubitelja koji duboko cene ovu prekrasnu umetnost. Pridružite nam se na ovom putovanju i dopustite nam da vam predstavimo naš jedinstveni pristup.

news.desc: Osudjujemo sa pravednim ogorcenjem i ne volimo ljude koji su tako zavedeni i zaslepljeni čarima trenutnog zadovoljstva, tako zaslepljeni željom da ne mogu predvideti bol i nevolju koja mora da usledi. Ovi slučajevi su potpuno jednostavni i lako ih je razlikovati. U slobodnom satu, kada je naša moć izbora neograničena, strukture podataka upravljaju podacima u tehnologiji.
news.quote: Lako možemo upravljati ako bismo samo preuzeli, svakog dana, teret koji nam je određen. Ali teret će biti pretežak za nas ako ponovo nosimo teret od juče i dodamo teret sutra pre nego što ga treba nositi.

blog1.title: Radno vreme za praznike: Uskrs 2023
blog1.content:
Zbog nastupajućih praznika, radno vreme parfimerije je prilagođeno radnom vremenu TC „Galerija“ Beograd.

  • Petak, 14.4., od 10.00 - 18.00
  • Subota, 15.4., od 10.00 - 22.00
  • Nedelja, 16.4., neradni dan

Takođe, sa zadovoljstvom vas obaveštavamo da ćemo imati puno radno vreme 1. i 2. maja, pružajući vam produženu priliku da nas posetite i uživate u očaravajućem svetu parfema.

Tim DURŌ niche parfimerije vam želi srećne Uskršnje praznike ispunjene ljubavlju, mirom i predivnim mirisima koji čine ovo doba godine posebnim.

blog2.title: Remek dela Milorada Bate Mihajlovića u DURŌ parfimeriji
blog2.content:
Povodom svečanog otvaranja, sa ponosom najavljujemo javnu izložbu dva velika dela našeg poznatog slikara i akademika Milorada Bate Mihajlovića (1923 - 2011) u prostoru DURŌ niche parfimerije. Ova remek dela potiču iz njegovog najboljeg pariskog perioda i prvi put su izložena u Srbiji. Izložba je realizovana u saradnji sa poznatim beogradskim kolekcionarima, a dela potiču iz fundusa čuvene pariske galerije „Ariel“, gde su la izlagana sredinom i krajem ’60-tih godina XX veka.

  • 1. „Hiljadu i jedna noć“, 1968., ulje na platnu, 146 x 114 cm
  • 2. „Velika kompozicija“, 1970., ulje na platnu, 146 x 114 cm


Milorad Bata Mihajlović je jedan od naših najznačajnijih slikara iz tzv. „pariskog kruga“, a njegova dela se nalaze u muzejima, privatnim zbirkama i institucijama širom sveta. Kritičari tog doba u Francuskoj opisuju ga kao slikara izuzetnog senzibiliteta, a njegova dela iz perioda druge polovine 60-tih godina odlikuje metaforičnost boja i naglašena ritmička figuracija.

U okviru galerijskog prostora, dostupni su i katalozi i monografije sa njegovim delima. Uskoro će u Beogradu biti organizovana velika retrospektivna izložba njegovog opusa, uz prezentaciju nove monografije i podršku Ministarstva kulture.

U svetu parfema, gde je savršenstvo moguće pronaći i u najmanjim nijansama, DURŌ ne samo da je osmislio parfemsko iskustvo koja će učiniti da se vreme zaustavi na sekund, već vam pruža priliku da upotpunite privlačnost tog utiska i prepustite se harmoniji mirisa i vanvremenske umetnosti.

Dela će biti izložena do daljnjeg.

Dobrodošli!

blog3.title: Svečano otvaranje DURŌ niche parfimerije u Beogradu
blog3.content:
Poštovane dame i gospodo, velika nam je čast i zadovoljstvo da podelimo sa vama radost povodom svečanog otvaranja naše nove parfimerije u TC „Galerija“ Beograd. U društvu dragih partnera, prijatelja, porodice i pravih zaljubljenika u parfeme, svečano smo presekli vrpcu i sa velikim oduševljenjem otvorili vrata DURŌ niche parfimerije!

Posebno smo zahvalni na neiscrpnoj ljubavi i ogromnom podsticajima koje nam pružate, jer je upravo vaša podrška omogućila naš rast i širenje na parfemsku scenu Srbije. Svaki pojedinačni doprinos je bio neprocenjiv za naš napredak u ovoj magičnoj avanturi parfemskog sveta!

Hvala svima koji su bili deo ovog nezaboravnog događaja! Jedva čekamo da vas ponovo ugostimo!

Živeli!

blog4.title: Veliko otvaranje DURŌ niche parfimerije
blog4.content:
DURŌ niche parfimerija s ponosom najavljuje svečanu ceremoniju otvaranja, označavajući početak jedinstvenog koncepta posvećenog umetnosti parfema u srcu Beograda. Čarobna atmosfera naše luksuzne parfimerije, smeštene u prestižnom TC "Galerija", stvara nezaboravno estetsko iskustvo koje prevazilazi vreme i ostavlja neizbrisiv utisak.

Grand Opening Event će se održati 10. aprila od 18.00 CET, na kome će biti predstavljeni izvanredni parfemi 25 niche parfemskih kuća koje ekskluzivno zastupamo na području Srbije: Electimuss, Ormonde Jayne, Jovoy, Jeroboam, Marc-Antoine Barrois, Fragrance du Bois, Puredistance, Histoires de Parfums, Paradis des Sens, Liquides Imaginaires, Veronique Gabai, Calaj, Theodoros Kalotinis, Parfums MDCI, Indult, Morph, Wesker, Anima Mundi, Onyrico, Castelbel, Portus Cale, Acque di Italia, Thameen i Affinessence.

Svaki brend oživljava esenciju luksuza, majstorske veštine i kreativnosti, nudeći neponovljivo parfemsko putovanje za sve.

Želimo da iskažemo iskrenu zahvalnost našim cenjenim partnerima, predstavnicima brendova, prijateljima i porodici na njihovoj nepokolebljivoj podršci u ostvarenju ovog sna. Pridružite nam se na ovom ekskluzivnom događaju.

Media contact:
Lav Šćelović-Pokupec, menadžer
lav@duro.cologne
+381 60 5561303

list.main: Dobrodošli na DURŌ veb sajt. Pristupanjem ili korišćenjem našeg sajta, slažete se sa sledećim uslovima i odredbama:
list.li1: Sav sadržaj na ovom veb-sajtu je vlasništvo kompanije DURŌ i ne sme se reprodukovati, kopirati ili koristiti bez naše izričite saglasnosti.
list.li2: Zadržavamo pravo da izmenimo ili uklonimo bilo koji deo našeg veb-sajta bez prethodnog obaveštenja.
list.li3: Nismo odgovorni za bilo kakve greške, propuste ili netačnosti u sadržaju naše veb stranice.
list.li4: Slažete se da će te našu veb stranicu koristiti samo u zakonite svrhe.

privacyPolicy.title: Politika privatnosti
privacyPolicy.li1: U parfimeriji DURŌ poštujemo Vašu privatnost i posvećeni smo zaštiti Vaših ličnih podataka. Svi lični podaci koje podelite sa nama, uključujući Vaše ime, adresu, telefonski broj i e-mail adresu, biće pohranjeni sa najvećom pažnjom i povjerljivošću. Obavezujemo se da nikada nećemo prodati ili podelitii Vaše lične podatke trećoj strani, osim ako smo zakonski u obavezi da to učinimo.
privacyPolicy.contact: Ako imate bilo kakvih pitanja u vezi s obradom vaših ličnih podataka, kontaktirajte nas na

cookiePolicy.title: Politika korišćenja kolačića
cookiePolicy.contact: Ako imate bilo kakvih pitanja u vezi naše Politike kolačića ili načina na koji rukujemo vašim ličnim informacijama, molimo kontaktirajte nas na
cookiePolicy.p1: Naša veb stranica koristi kolačiće (eng. cookies) kako bi poboljšala vaše iskustvo posete našoj veb stranici. Kolačić je mali tekstualni fajl koji se skladišti na vašem računaru ili mobilnom uređaju kada posetite našu veb stranicu. Kolačići nam omogućavaju praćenje vaše aktivnosti pregledanja naše veb stranice, što nam pomaže da poboljšamo korisničko iskustvo i pružimo personalizovani sadržaj.
cookiePolicy.p2: Koristimo i sesijske kolačiće koji ističu kada zatvorite pregledač, i trajne kolačiće koji ostaju na uređaju dok ne isteknu ili ih ne izbrišete.

p3.main: Korišćenjem našeg veb sajta, slažete se sa korišćenjem kolačića:
p3.li1: Da bismo zapamtili vaše postavke i podešavanja.
p3.li2: Za merenje i analizu saobraćaja na našem veb sajtu.
p3.li3: Da personalizujemo vaše iskustvo na našoj veb stranici.

eligibility.count_1: Ova nagradna igra je otvorena za osobe starije od 18 godina.
eligibility.count_2: Da bi učestvovali u nagradnoj igri, učesnici moraju da ispune sledeće korake:
eligibility.li4: Prijatelji takođe treba da  prate DURŌ Instagram nalog
eligibility.li5: Podeliti objavu nagradne igre kao Instagram story

prize.count_1: Nagradna igra počinje u petak, 07.07.2023. i završava se 17.07.2023. u 18.00.
prize.li1: Parfem po izboru: Pobednik može da izabere parfem po sopstvenom izboru iz DURŌ parfimerije sa vrednošću do 20.000,00 RSD.
prize.li2: Dr. Vranjes Rosso Nobile set za automobil: Pobednik će dobiti Dr. Vranjes Rosso Nobile set parfema za automobil sa vrednošću do 8.500,00 RSD.
prize.li3: DURŌ Vaučer: Pobednik će dobiti DURŌ vaučer sa vrednošću od 10.000,00 RSD koji se može iskoristiti u DURŌ parfimeriji.

winner.li1: Pobednici će biti izabrani nasumično između učesnika koji ispunjavaju uslove.
winner.li2: Pobednici će biti objavljeni 17.07.2023. u 18.30 na našem Instagram storiju, kao i u komentaru na Instagram objavi.
winner.li3: Pobednici  će biti kontaktirani putem Instagram Direct Message poruke i moraju da odgovore u roku od 3 dana kako bi preuzeli nagrade.
winner.li4: Ako pobednici ne odgovore u navedenom roku ili se utvrdi da ne ispunjavaju uslove, može se izabrati novi pobednik.

general.li1: Nagrade se ne mogu preneti na drugu osobu niti zameniti za gotovinu ili druge alternative.
general.li2: Ova nagradna igra nije sponzorisana, podržana ili administrirana od strane Instagrama.
general.li3: Sudelovanjem u nagradnoj igri, učesnici daju dozvolu za upotrebu svog imena i lika u promotivne svrhe.
general.li4: DURŌ zadržava pravo da izmeni, suspenduje ili otkaže nagradnu igru u bilo koje vreme bez prethodne najave.
general.li5: Učesnici su odgovorni za obezbeđivanje da njihov unos bude u skladu sa svim primenjivim zakonima i propisima.
general.li6: DURŌ nije odgovoran za tehničke probleme, kašnjenja ili greške tokom procesa prijave ili izbora nagrada.
general.li7: Učesnici su odgovorni za plaćanje svih poreza i taksi koje mogu biti povezane sa nagradama, ukoliko je to primenjivo.
general.li8: Slanje nagrada je ograničeno na adrese unutar Srbije.
general.li9: Zaposleni i članovi porodice DURŌ parfimerije nemaju pravo učestvovanja u nagradnoj igri.
general.count_1: Za sva pitanja u vezi nagradne igre, kontaktirajte

errors.name: Ime je potrebno
errors.thanks: Hvala vam što ste se prijavili!

500.title: Ups! Došlo je do greške.
500.desc1: Stranica koju tražite trenutno nije dostupna.

subscribe.title: Pridružite se našoj zajednici ljubitelja parfema!
subscribe.desc: Pretplatite se na naš newsletter kako biste dobijali najnovije vesti, promotivne ponude, korisne savete, kao i ekskluzivne dvonedeljne vesti iz sveta luksuznih niche parfema.
subscribe.notice: Poštujemo vašu privatnost i obavezujemo se da vam nikada nećemo slati informacije niti otkrivati vaše lične podatke bez vašeg pristanka. Strogo se pridržavamo naše

cookies.consent: Korišćenjem ovog veb sajta, pristajete na upotrebu kolačića (eng. cookies) radi poboljšanja vašeg pregledanja.
cookies.notice: Za više informacija o tome kako koristimo kolačiće, molimo pogledajte našu

electimuss.lead:
Parfemi londonske kuće Electimuss predstavljaju svojevrsni oblik umetnosti. Inspirisani raskoši i čarolijom drevnog Rima, parfemi otelotvoruju kvalitet, individualnost i kreativnost bez premca.

U saradnji sa nekim od najtalentovanijih parfimera, poput Julien Rasquineta, Christiana Provenzana, Johna Stephensa, Marca Genovesea i Sofije Bardelli stvaraju jedinstvena parfemska remek dela koja naglašavaju posebnost i imaju moć da obične trenutke pretvore u nezaboravna iskustva za sva čula.
electimuss.story:
Strast Rimljana prema parfemima i njihova potraga za najfinijim mirisima duboko je utkana u kuću Electimuss London. Inspiracija se crpi iz epskih priča i rituala, gde je miris bio utkan u svaki aspekt života - od proslava do zavođenja. Ove živopisne priče hrane maštu parfimera i služe kao izvor nadahnuća za fascinantna dela.

Electimuss London je riznica mirisa u kojoj se neprestano traga za najboljim. Baš kao što su Rimljani putovali širom Rimskog Carstva u potrazi za izuzetnim uljima i esencijama, parfimeri pažljivo mešaju retke i dragocene elemente. Njihova posvećenost kvalitetu ne poznaje granice, jer Electimuss parfemi sadrže 25% ili 30% parfemskog ulja, što rezultira dekadentno hrabrim mešavinama koje dugo ostaju na koži.

Drugo ime za Electimuss parfeme je ”Intenzitet”. Svaka kompozicija je moćni eliksir mirisa, pažljivo formulisana za neuporedivu projekciju i trajnost. U kući Electimuss se veruje da luksuz treba da bude dostupan svima, zbog čega kombinuju izuzetan kvalitet sa pristupačnim cenama, omogućavajući ljubiteljima parfema sa različitim budžetima da dožive čaroliju njihovih kreacija.

Saradnja sa najtalentovanijim parfimerima na svetu, kao što su Julien Rasquinet, Christian Provenzano, John Stephens, Marco Genovese i Sofia Bardelli, omogućava im da pretvore svoje olfaktorne vizije u stvarnost. Kroz svoje parfeme, ciljaju da osnaže pojedince da izraze svoj jedinstveni identitet i da svakodnevne trenutke pretvore u izvanredna iskustva.

Otkrijte više o brendu Electimuss London na njihovom veb sajtu.
electimuss.quote: Kroz maglu vremena, rimske legende šapuću o hedonističkim užicima i raskoši, o ambiciji i zavođenju. Electimuss London je kuća luksuznih parfema inspirisana legendama o ljubavi, moći i glamuru Rima.

ormonde-jayne.lead:
Ormonde Jayne je ekskluzivna parfemska kuća koju je u Londonu osnovala Linda Pilkington. Parfeme ove kuće krase sastojci koji se retko koriste.

Parfemi Ormonde Jayne smešteni su u jednostavne i elegantne bočice od debljeg stakla, a upakovani su u prepoznatjlive narandžaste kutije. Parfemi su dostupni u koncentraciji eau de parfum a postoji i opcija made to measure, gde koncentraciju određuju kupci po sopstvenom nahođenju. Odabrani mirisi iz kolekcije takođe su dostupni kao mirisne sveće, losioni i kreme za telo, parfemi za kosu i ulje za kupanje.
ormonde-jayne.story:
Do stvaranja ove kuće dovela je Lindina dugogodišnja fascinacija parfemskim bočicama, parfemima ali i ukusima. Od ranog detinjstva i ljubavi prema parfemskim bočicama do njenih putovanja širom sveta, strast za mirisima i različitim kulturama oblikovala je suštinu brenda Ormonde Jayne. Počevši od izrade izuzetnih mirisnih sveća, brend je brzo stekao priznanje i proširio asortiman koji obuhvata parfeme, sprejeve za prostor, kupke ulja i kreme za telo. Sa butikom na londonskoj Old Bond Street, kuća Ormonde Jayne je postala pionir britanske niche parfimerije, spajajući englesku zanatsku veštinu, francusku parfemsku umetnost i senzualnost Orijenta. Inteligentan dizajn, čiste linije i živopisno pakovanje brenda odražavaju beskrajnu eleganciju i stvaraju zaista zadivljujuće iskustvo.

Otkrijte više o brendu Ormonde Jayne na njihovom veb sajtu.
ormonde-jayne.quote: Stvarajući Ormonde Jayne, moj cilj je bio da spojim elemente koje smatram simbolima istinske elegancije: kvalitet engleskog zanatstva, umetnost francuske parfimerije i senzualnost i prirodnu harmoniju Orijenta

jovoy.lead: Pariska kuća Jovoy je osnovana 1923. godine. Prvobitno je bila poznata po izuzetnoj liniji parfema sa bocama u obliku životinja, tako da su jedinstvene kreacije parfimerke Blanche Arvoy osvajale svet. Blanche je godinu dana kasnije osnovala novu kuću, Corday, nazvanu po revolucionarki Charlotte Corday. Iako je kuća Corday prestala sa proizvodnjom početkom 1960-ih, nasleđe Jovoya je ostalo.
jovoy.story:
U svetu crno-bele, ponekad zlatne, često crvene boje, Jovoy dočarava duh današnjeg doba kroz svoj upečatljiv i očaravajući vizuelni stil.

Smeštena u ulici Rue de Castiglione u Parizu, ova parfemska kuća ostaje posvećena svojim osnovnim vrednostima: retkosti, istraživanju, divljenju, nijansama, radosti, hrabrosti, lojalnosti, eleganciji, osetljivosti i nezasitnoj radoznalosti što je koncept koji osnivač modernog Jovoy zdanja Francois Henin i dugoročni partneri sprovode na način koji nezaustavljivo obuhvata parfemsku scenu koja se neprestano menja.
jovoy.quote: U Jovoy carstvu slavimo izvanredno. Naši parfemi su stvoreni da prevaziđu obično, pozivajući vas da doživite trenutke uzvišene lepote i očaravajuće emocije

thameen.tagline: Stvaramo za danas, misleći na budućnost
thameen.lead:
Thameen London je britanski niche brend osnovan 2013. godine, donoseći viziju britanskog duha u svet mirisa, odajući počast bogatom britanskom nasleđu, kulturi i tradicijama.

Crpeći inspiraciju iz raskošnog sveta orijentalnih aroma, svaki parfem je svedočanstvo o spoju mirisa i dragocenih dragulja, pažljivo izrađen da očara čula.
thameen.story:
Naziv Thameen se prevodi kao 'dragoceno', opisujući suštinu brenda, koja odražava pažljiv izbor visokokvalitetnih materijala koje se koriste, tako da svaki parfem donosi luksuzni osećaj i opipljivost modernog. Njihovi parfemi svedoče o kreativnoj moći priča, slaveći veštinu i dugotrajnost uz visoku svest o upotrebi održivih sastojaka.

Kreativni direktor brenda je Basel Binjabr, čija se strast prema parfemima rodila u detinjstvu. Poseban odnost njegovog oca prema ružinom ulju, koje je posmatrao kao svoje 'dragocene dragulje', Binjabr je bio fasciniran vezom između parfema i dragog kamenja. Ova nesvakidašnja inspiracija se sada ogleda kroz Thameen, gde parfemi utelovljuju suštinu statusa, bogatstva, lepote, ljubavi i želje - kvaliteta koje su sinonim za drago kamenje. Bočice Thameen parfema su zanosno plave boje, slično safirima.

Thameen parfemi pružaju očaravajuće senzorno iskustvo gde kombinacija retkih mirisnih ulja i esencija omogućava izuzetnu postojanost a složene formule čine da parfemi sa kože odlično projektuju.
thameen.quote: Sa svakim dodirom sa kožom, Thameen otkriva tapiseriju duha, slikajući živopisni portret bića kroz note koje se poigravaju na telu.

marc-antoine-barrois.lead:
Marc-Antoine Barrois is not just a couture house; it is a journey into the art of sophistication and timeless elegance. With a profound understanding of craftsmanship and an unwavering commitment to excellence, Marc-Antoine Barrois pushes the boundaries of creativity, creating a world where every detail is meticulously crafted to perfection.

The collaboration between Marc-Antoine Barrois and master perfumer Quentin Bisch gave birth to an unparalleled collection of fragrances.
marc-antoine-barrois.story:
In 2015, Marc-Antoine Barrois and Quentin Bisch embarked on a creative partnership that would redefine the boundaries of perfumery. With a shared passion for craftsmanship and an uncompromising dedication to their art, they embarked on a journey to create fragrances that transcend traditional conventions. Drawing inspiration from childhood memories and their love for fine materials, the duo crafted a collection that captures the essence of luxury and sophistication.

One of their remarkable creations, Ganymede, took the fragrance world by storm. Named after the mythical satellite of Jupiter, Ganymede represents a new frontier in elegance. This leather-based perfume combines the luminosity of mandarin, the floral essence of violet, the mineral accents of immortelle, and the subtlety of suede. It is a symphony of contrasts, a sensory revelation that takes you on a perfumed journey to a new imaginary world.

Quentin Bisch has been crowned 'Perfumer of the Year' for this creation, while the Ganymede, was awarded the 'Best Perfume' award for an independent niche brand in 2020 by The Fragrance Foundation, solidifying its place as a true icon in the fragrance industry.
marc-antoine-barrois.quote: Ganymede - the best perfume in the world! The Essence of Oneiric Reality. A symphony of contrasts. A sensory revelation.

fragrance-du-bois.tagline: Born in Nature, Crafted in France
fragrance-du-bois.lead:
Fragrance du Bois, a French niche perfume house, embodies the richness of nature, immersing you in a sensory journey back in time, as their exquisite creations evoke long-lost memories, fleeting emotions, and moments of pure joy. Each fragrance is a captivating masterpiece, crafted from the finest ingredients that ignite the imagination and stir deep emotions, resonating with your unique and intimate self.

Fragrance du Bois upholds a promise of sustainability and uncompromising quality. Using only 100% pure, sustainable natural perfume oils and extracts sourced from around the world, they work closely with master perfumers who bring a variety and depth to their collections. Their long-standing collaboration with these perfumers ensures consistency and unwavering quality, as they not only create the perfumes but also supply the perfume concentrate oils, preserving the integrity of their formulations.
fragrance-du-bois.story:
Headquartered in Paris, France, Fragrance du Bois is a niche perfume house that captures purest essences of nature. At the heart of every creation lies Fragrance du Bois' signature Oud, an opulent and unique ingredient that exudes unrivaled luxury. With an unwavering commitment to sustainability and ethical sourcing, Fragrance du Bois ensures that all Oud is produced on their sustainably managed plantations.

From soil to oil, Fragrance du Bois follows a vertically integrated business model that sets a new industry benchmark. Every step of the process, from acquiring land for agarwood trees to expert forestry stewardship and distillation, is meticulously managed. Through value-added manufacturing, Fragrance du Bois plays an active role in revitalizing local economies. Moreover, Fragrance du Bois actively engages in raising awareness about the conservation of Aquilaria trees, the source of Oud, in the wild. This level of control guarantees the utmost quality and sustainability in their fragrances.

Fragrance du Bois embodies the harmonious blend of artistry and nature's most exquisite treasures. Every fragrance tells a captivating tale, evoking cherished memories, and stirring emotions.
fragrance-du-bois.quote: Born in Nature, Crafted in France

puredistance.lead:
Puredistance, founded in 2007 by Jan Ewoud Vos, has established itself as one of the world's most exclusive and luxurious perfume houses. Collaborating with Master Perfumers from Paris, London, and New York, Puredistance has meticulously crafted a range of fragrances that are celebrated as some of the most luxurious in the world.

While the brand's perfumes are expertly created in global fragrance capitals, its main office and design center reside in a historic church building in the Netherlands.
puredistance.story:
Puredistance has become a beacon of elegance and opulence in the fragrance industry, embracing the ethos that 'small is beautiful.' As a 100% independent company, Puredistance defies industry conventions by remaining personal and exceptionally special. The brand's unwavering commitment to perfection is evident in its exclusive offering of Pure Perfume Extrait, the most precious form of fragrance. Each Puredistance Perfume possesses a distinct personality, captivating fragrance connoisseurs and enthusiasts worldwide. Customers and perfume bloggers alike praise the genuine uniqueness and unmistakable signature found in every creation.

The true magic behind Puredistance's extraordinary olfactory masterpieces lies in the collaboration with renowned Master Perfumers. These accomplished perfumers, including Annie Buzantian in New York, Antoine Lie and Cécile Zarokian in Paris, and Roja Dove in London, infuse their expertise and artistic sensibilities into each Puredistance Perfume, particularly in the Master Perfume Collection. Meticulous hand-finishing ensures that every perfume is an exquisite work of art, presented in the distinguished Puredistance gift box alongside a personally signed certificate of authenticity by owner Jan Ewoud Vos.

The brand's exclusivity is reflected in its carefully selected distribution, with less than 100 prestigious perfumeries worldwide authorized to carry Puredistance.
puredistance.quote: Not just another perfume, but a Perfume with a soul and a signature.

histoires-de-parfums.tagline: Stories to be read on your skin
histoires-de-parfums.lead:
Histoires de Parfums is a maison Parisienne and olfactive library where fragrances transform into narratives about famous characters, mythical years, poems, and music.

Founder Gérald Ghislain, driven by boundless inspiration, brings these stories to life through perfumes - a sensitive and sensual medium. Each fragrance is presented in a Deluxe edition, inviting you to experience the story on your own skin.
histoires-de-parfums.story:
Histoires de Parfums embodies the essence of French perfumery, perpetuating its savoir-faire rooted in luxury, nobility, and creativity. The brand sets the highest standards in selecting raw materials, designing bottles, packaging, and communication tools.

This extraordinary brand presents fragrant novels, musical scores, and poems in the form of perfumes. Within its collection, you will encounter remarkable characters, discover the finest materials in the world of perfumery, immerse yourself in poetry from both the Orient and Occident, and encounter sublime divas.

Just as books are written with emotions, Gerald Ghislain, the creator of Histoires de Parfums, seeks to evoke stories through scent. A passionate and versatile individual, Gerald has scripted his own narrative with the rhythm of a devoted epicurean. In 2000, he founded Histoires de Parfums and crafted a collection of rare and delicate perfumes, reflecting his vibrant temperament and wanderlust spirit.

The perfumes of Histoires de Parfums leave a lasting impression with their profound and sensual notes, captivating the senses and forging a deep connection.
histoires-de-parfums.quote: My perfumes have never been about a quest for the most beautiful scent, but always for the most beautiful emotion.

paradis-des-sens.lead:
Paradis des Sens is a French brand founded in 2020, born out of a deep appreciation for your unique essence.

This is the place to escape. This is the place where nature brings meaning to life and provides a journey to paradise. Close your eyes. Take a breath. You have arrived to peace, to serenity, to heavenly bliss… to a paradise of the senses.
paradis-des-sens.story:
At Paradis des Sens, we have always been captivated by the power of fragrances, their ability to transport us to distant memories and dreamlike landscapes. It's like discovering a secret door that leads to your own personal Eden.

Each of our scents is a carefully woven tale, a handcrafted symphony of notes that embodies the essence of perfection in aromatic form. Paradis des Sens invites you on a journey through mysterious landscapes. At Paradis des Sens, we are fascinated by the evocative power of fragrances. They have the ability to awaken memories of bygone times and ignite fantasies of faraway landscapes. Our minimalist clear bottles serve as mirrors, inviting you to see yourself subtly interpreted in our bespoke scents.

As the fragrance becomes one with your skin, its heavenly aroma fills the air, merging with your surroundings and becoming an integral part of who you are.
paradis-des-sens.quote: Paradis des Sens is a fragrant manifestation of nature's serenity, a celebration of the longing for peace and the expression of beauty.

liquides-imaginaries.tagline: The Key to the Imaginary World
liquides-imaginaries.lead: Liquides Imaginaires is a French artistic brand founded by Philippe Di Méo with a vision to rediscover the essence of perfume and illuminate its magical dimensions. These fragrances capture states, stages of life, desires, and strengths, embodying opposing yet inseparable elements - good and evil, day and night, wisdom and intoxication.
liquides-imaginaries.story:
Liquides Imaginaires, co-founded by David Frossard and Philippe Di Méo, aims to revive the ceremony and ritual of perfume craft. The brand's bottles are designed to be mysterious, enclosing the reminiscent of an amphora - an ancient vessel used to carry and store precious essences.

The fragrances crafted by Liquides Imaginaires are like intricate puzzles, inviting interpretation of thoughts, intentions, confessions, and commemorating passages of life, desires, beliefs, strengths, and weaknesses. They transport those who wear them from the material world to imaginary and intimate realms, exploring new horizons and desires.

Liquides Imaginaires releases fragrances as trilogies, creating collections of three scents connected by a central theme. This approach allows for a deeper exploration of the fragrance narrative.

jeroboam.lead:
Jeroboam, a Parisian niche fragrance house, draws inspiration from its namesake wine bottles. Founded by Francois Henin, the visionary behind Jovoy Paris, it offers bold, innovative perfumes. Each fragrance is a masterpiece, capturing different facets of life.

The brand's name pays homage to the biblical character Jeroboam, symbolizing its belief in perfumery as a regal art form. It blends classic and contemporary elements, catering to exceptional individuals.
jeroboam.story:
Jeroboam is a creative exploration between Francois Hénin and Vanina Muracciole. The philosophy behind the brand, showcased by Jéroboam flacons created after six-liter wine bottles, is that 'major perfumes don't need big bottles.' With the tagline 'Perfume Extracts for Urban Nomads,' Jeroboam embodies universal appeal, where fragrances become an international language of seduction. The brand embraces contrast and uniqueness, provoking the question of what defines a perfume as major.

Perfume, for Jeroboam, is a weapon wielded by those who understand its power. Offering fragrances in their most potent extract concentration, these extracts leave an indelible impression and possess inherent nobility, tailored for those with a flirtatious, provocative nature and strong character.

Jeroboam fragrances, characterized by musky bases like most modern perfumes, are designed to be universal. The small bottles make ideal accessories for everyday use, while the scents themselves remind us that fragrance can be more powerful than words.
jeroboam.quote: Najbolji parfemi ne zahtevaju velike boce

veronique-gabai.tagline: Sunshine for the senses and the soul
veronique-gabai.lead:
Veronique Gabai is a US brand founded by Veronique Gabai in 2019. It is a new luxury brand inspired by France and the Cote d’Azur, anchored in Nature, Culture, and Glamour.

The brand offers exceptional perfumes, beauty must-haves, and unique accessories that embody the essence of the Mediterranean and bring sunshine to the senses and the soul. Crafted around the best of nature, Veronique Gabai's products are long-lasting, mood-boosting, and unique on your skin.
veronique-gabai.story:
'There is a place in the world and in my heart where I was born. It is a place of discovery, wonder, and grace - a place made of hedonism and humanism. A place where the sun shines like gold.' These words, inspired by the Cote d’Azur, encapsulate the vision behind Veronique Gabai.

With nature and Mediterranean at its core, Veronique Gabai's brand draws inspiration from its beauty, harnesses the power of its plants, and always strives to protect its future. The brand aspires to bring people closer together in a peaceful and festive atmosphere. Veronique Gabai aims to add generosity to luxury, infuse pleasure and magic into the experience, and enhance the beauty of everyday life - Sunshine for the Senses and for the Soul.

In its commitment to sustainability, the brand has embraced the concept of refillable products, joining the movement towards a more sustainable future. The brand's golden fragrance bottles and smaller travel cases are designed to be kept forever and refilled, offering a generous cost-saving benefit. Additionally, the body products and all outer packaging are fully recyclable.

Veronique Gabai is a love letter to the Côte d'Azur, a collection of fragrances that seamlessly combines the traditions of fine French perfumery with a modern sensibility. With a focus on sustainability, practicality, and wearability, Veronique Gabai invites you to experience the essence of the South of France in every drop.
veronique-gabai.quote: Fragrances and Beauty Inspired by the South of France

theodoros-kalotinis.lead:
Theodoros Kalotinis is renowned as the first Greek house of artisanal perfume, transforming nature into inspiration and gaining worldwide recognition.

Founded by Theodoros Kalotinis in 2014, he combines unique essential oils of haute perfumerie with alcohol distilled from natural grapes. This process is so unique to him that it is regarded as his personal patent for crafting perfumes.
theodoros-kalotinis.story:
Theodoros Kalotinis, born and raised in Heraklion, Crete, cultivated his love for nature and scents from childhood. Guided by his grandmother, who hailed from Smirni, they engaged in weekend activities in her kitchen filled with herbs and spices. Blindfolded, young Theo learned to recognize different aromas, honing his sense of smell. What was once a childhood game paved the way for his future passion.

As an adolescent, Theodoros became a perfume collector and later embarked on a journey to create his own perfumes using substances from Greek nature. Eager to expand his knowledge, he traveled to Grasse, France, to learn the fundamental principles of perfumery and studied cosmetology at a Greek university.

Today, Theodoros Kalotinis Perfumer is renowned as the first Greek house of artisanal perfumery, bearing the name of its founder. The brand reached new heights of success in 2018 when Theodore Kalotinis created personal perfumes for the Prince of Wales, Charles, and the Duchess of Cornwall, Camilla.

Since then, the brand's reputation has steadily grown, spreading worldwide, and Theodoros Kalotinis has supplied his perfumes to numerous international celebrities. The brand's combination of classicism and high-quality natural substances captivates the hearts and trust of perfume enthusiasts who appreciate perfumes known for their distinctiveness and authenticity.
theodoros-kalotinis.quote: The first Greek fragrance house, handcrafting perfumes from the highest quality ingredients

mdci.lead:
Parfums MDCI is an independent French fragrance house, known for its exclusive perfumes and unique flacons.

Founded in 2003, the brand combines exquisite fragrances with artistic bottle designs, adorned with handcrafted busts. The enchantment of their exquisite fragrances is heightened by the emotional beauty of these bottles, making Parfums MDCI a sought-after choice for fragrance enthusiasts and collectors worldwide.
mdci.story:
Behind the MDCI (Marchal Dessins et Créations Indépendantes) brand, is an art lover with a passion for perfumes. The brand embraces perfumery as an art form and revives the French tradition of fine fragrances. Collaborating with talented perfumers, Parfums MDCI creates rare and original perfumes presented in aesthetically unique bottles. Their work is appreciated by discerning collectors and connoisseurs, with a global recognition for their beauty, originality, and elegance.

MDCI's approach is a blend of classicism and innovation. The brand deliberately limits production to a few thousand pieces per year, ensuring each bottle is meticulously crafted and reflecting the brand's commitment to craftsmanship. The hand sculpted busts used as stoppers exemplify their attention to detail. Inspired by historical periods such as the Classical Age and the Italian Renaissance, MDCI offers a departure from mass-produced minimalism, presenting small sculptures on refined cylindrical plinths.

Founder Claude Marchal personally oversees the creative process, drawing inspiration from prestigious landmarks and art masterpieces. From Bernini's sculptures to the Louvre and the Gardens of Luxembourg, to the grandeur of halls in Louvre and Uffizi, these busts are true master pieces. each cap reflects the brand's enduring love for art.

Parfums MDCI collaborates with renowned perfumers including Pierre Bourdon, Bertrand Duchaufour, Cécile Zarokian, Richard Ibanez, Francis Kurkdjian, Stephanie Bakouche, Anne-Sophie Behaghel, Patricia de Nicolai, Amandine Clerc-Marie, Jeanne-Marie Faugier, Nathalie Feisthauer, and Irene Farmachidi.
mdci.quote: The epitome of artistry and elegance, Parfums MDCI combines exquisite fragrances with uniquely crafted bottles, creating a something that is truly exceptional

indult.lead:
Indult Paris, founded in 2006 by Francis Kurkdjian, is a true homage to exclusivity. Initially, production was scarce and limited to just 999 bottles of each fragrance, turning these bottles into highly sought-after treasures in the niche market.

Years later, captivated by the captivating allure of the brand, it was revived, allowing people to experience the beauty of these exceptional creations once again. Today, Indult Paris remains committed to its original belief, collaborating with master perfumers to shape the essence of the finest raw materials into exquisite signature fragrances.
indult.story:
Francis Kurkdjian, one of the most prolific and acclaimed perfumers of our time, founded Indult Paris and crafted its inaugural fragrances - Tihota, Manakara, Rêve en Cuir, and Isvaraya. A graduate of the ISIPCA Perfumery school, Kurkdjian's talent shone brightly with the creation of Jean-Paul Gaultier's Le Mâle, which became a global bestseller. His approach to perfumery is guided by a simple philosophy: ‘never follow trends, create them.’ In 2001, he was awarded the prestigious François Coty Perfumers Prize.

While many may be familiar with Maison Francis Kurkdjian, founded in 2010, few know that Francis was the original founder and nose behind Indult. The inaugural fragrances of the range hold a special place in his heart, representing incredible talent and the finest raw materials meticulously infused into these olfactory creations.

Nathalie Feisthauer, a highly esteemed perfumer with a worldwide reputation, joined Indult Paris to contribute her exceptional skills and distinctive style to the brand. A graduate of The Givaudan perfumery school, Feisthauer began her career in the Estée Lauder Group in New York City. Known for her tremendous flair, finesse, and dedication, she has created fragrances for iconic fashion brands that have become bestsellers and left an indelible mark in perfume history. Nathalie holds numerous industry-wide awards, including the Perfumer of the Year 2019.

Indult Paris takes its name from the concept of 'indulgence,' a privilege granted to select individuals by the King of France or the Pope to enjoy exclusive favors. Inspired by aristocratic privileges and exclusivity, Indult perfumes are precious, confidential, and crafted with meticulously selected natural and rare ingredients.
indult.quote: Signature scents crafted by the finest perfumers

wesker.lead:
Wesker, a German fragrance brand founded in 2020, creates precious perfumes with a profound and unmistakable character. Each fragrance becomes a faithful accomplice, establishing a symbiotic relationship with the wearer.

Through a fusion of several hundred finest natural raw materials and fragrant molecules, carefully selected and blended by their in-house perfumers, Wesker delivers an extraordinary and unforgettable fragrant experience.
wesker.story:
Wesker believes in the noble art of high perfumery, which demands the finest and most valuable raw materials in their purest form. To ensure supreme quality, they source exclusive natural ingredients from around the world, selecting only the best that nature has provided. With advanced molecular technology, they transcend natural boundaries, unlocking the full potential of these highly sophisticated materials. This mastery enables the creation of remarkable and genuinely unique perfumes that captivate the senses.

Every Wesker flacon is a testament to expert handcraftsmanship. Meticulously handcrafted by their artisans and adorned with exquisite gold leaf patterns, each fragrance flacon becomes a unique collector's piece.

The caps are skillfully coated using a special technique, acquiring a distinctive leather-like texture before being adorned with the golden star of Sirius. Reflecting the individuality of the perfumes, the flacons, and their exquisite packaging bear a unique golden wax seal, embodying the emblem of Wesker.
wesker.quote: Where the noble art of artistic perfumery meets exquisite craftsmanship

morph.lead:
Morph Parfum, founded in 2013, is an Italian niche brand. With a commitment to defying temporary trends, Morph crafts extraordinary and unusual fragrances.

Their passion for sourcing the finest natural essences from around the world results in intensified and enduring fragrances, each narrating stories of adventure, love, and nostalgia.
morph.story:
Morph Parfum is an olfactory movement dedicated to Metamorphosis. Guided by a deep sense of beauty, refined taste, and meticulous research, Morph continually pushes the boundaries of fragrance creation.

Their perfumes anticipate and interpret the desires of the market, presenting intriguing and unexpected olfactory creations. Morph fragrances offer a Luxury Essence Experience, crafted with highly concentrated raw materials, exquisite attention to detail, and exclusive distribution. Each creation is more than just a perfume; it is an immersive voyage presented with exclusive packages that are signature for the brand.

Morph Parfum collaborates with world-renowned noses and fragrance connoisseurs, such as Douglas Morel, Sofia Bardelli, Luca Maffei, and Arturetto Landi, to bring their visions to life.
morph.quote: For us, doing things well is not enough. We want to make them extraordinary

anima-mundi.lead:
Anima Mundi, a Swiss niche brand founded in 2017, takes us on a captivating journey back to the most fascinating and remote periods of human history. It celebrates the origins of writing, philosophy, religions, and the majestic architectures that evoke deep emotions and admiration.

Founded by Emilia Chinigò and Giorgio Biella, Anima Mundi embodies the essence of ancient civilizations and echoes philosophical principles that have shaped our world since the dawn of time.
anima-mundi.story:
‘Anima Mundi’ derives from the ancient Latin words meaning ‘Soul of the World’, and it seeks to capture the essence of that elusive 'breath' that gives life to all things and fuels the creative spirit that forms our universe. It is a testament to the profound belief that fragrances hold the power to unlock hidden memories, connect us to ancient civilizations, and stir our deepest emotions.

With each fragrance, Anima Mundi invites you to experience the intangible connection between scent and the human soul. Like a journey through time, their fragrances serve as portals that bridge temporal. They are more than mere scents; they are the essence of a people, an evocative echo of principles that have reverberated through the ages.

As you embark on this olfactory voyage with Anima Mundi, you will encounter fragrances that embody the wisdom of the past and evoke the beauty and mystique of bygone eras. Each fragrance is a testament to the indomitable spirit of human ingenuity and the enduring legacy of civilizations that shaped our world.

Inspired by preserved texts and engravings found on ancient temples, Anima Mundi presents an exclusive signature collection that celebrates the greatest civilizations of the past and their sophisticated olfactory practices. These precious fragrances invoke the wisdom and heritage found on the walls of Pompeii's villas, the laboratories of the Pyramids, the manuscripts of the Mayan Codes, and the Ayurvedic texts.

It is Love’s red thread which connects the Art to the Sacred. Honoring the profound connection between art and the sacred, Anima Mundi focuses on the plants, resins, flowers, trees, and fragrances that played pivotal roles in sacred and religious cults. It offers an olfactory voyage through space and time, revealing the sacred dimension of five great civilizations.
anima-mundi.quote: Discover the fragrance that awakens the 'Soul of the World' within you

onyrico.lead:
Onyrico is a perfume brand that embodies freedom, independence, and individualism. Created without creative or material constraints, Onyrico reflects our souls and expresses our dreams.

Logic will get you from A to Z, imagination will get you everywhere. Art finds its expression through human creations, and perfume is no exception. Onyrico believes that perfume is an art that exists through human creation. It pays tribute to the Italian genius that has bestowed beauty upon the world for centuries.
onyrico.story:
Onyrico, meaning 'world of dream,' seeks to manifest a daydream without limits of space and time through its perfumes. It celebrates the pleasure of refined beauty, attention to detail, and endless nuances. Time, the most important ingredient of Onyrico, is intertwined with the exploration of history and space. The debut collection of ten fragrances emerges from a desire to proudly affirm Italian heritage, capturing its timeless emotions. A journey begins with words, sounds, colours and aromas, which unite in a rainbow of suggestions, a bridge between heaven and earth: like on the strings of a multi-coloured harp.

Founded by Emilia Armida Chinigò and Pier-Giorgio Biella, Onyrico represents the convergence of their dreams. Emilia, a creative soul with a suitcase full of bright dreams, and Giorgio, a successful entrepreneur seeking a new passion, are the heart and wings behind this endeavor. Together, they established Onyrico as the first brand of Niche and Co., a free and independent perfume house.

Perfume bottles, adorned with marble caps, symbolize love, respect for nature, and an eternal message for our Earth. Evoking visions of ancient stone arches, they rest lightly on white clouds against the blue sky. The keystone, the central stone, embodies history, eternity, and immortality. This natural choice reflects Italian architectural artistry, with its swirling marble design reminiscent of our aromatic essence. The stone cap represents Earth's infinite journey towards infinity, where life originated, giving birth to its fragrant perfumes.
onyrico.quote: Made of the same matter dreams are made of

acque-di-italia.lead:
Acque di Italia is an Italian brand that celebrates tradition, elegance, and wellbeing. Inspired by the rituals of Ancient Roman baths, their products possess transformative powers of self-care, pampering, and inner peace.

With a blend of cherished practices and aromatic allure, Acque di Italia unlocks the beauty of these ancient rituals.
acque-di-italia.story:
Acque di Italia draws inspiration from the Latin saying 'Mens sana in corpore sano,' meaning 'A healthy mind in a healthy body.' The brand nurtures both the body and mind, crafting a range of products and fragrances that draw from the serene escape of ancient thermal baths, recreating moments of tranquility and self-care. From hand wash to body lotion, our product range embodies the essence of inner peace.

Reflecting the ever-changing moods of individuals, our full range of products is available in five distinct fragrances:

  • VITALITAS - Strength, awakening, vitality, and energy
  • SERENITAS - Relaxation, quietness, and inner peace
  • VOLUPTAS - Pleasure, lust, and passion
  • GAUDIUM - Joy, euphoria, and celebration
  • INCENDIUM - Delight, delicacy, and indulgence

Water, movement, and relaxation form the foundation of Acque di Italia's concept, reflected in both the logo and color palette. The brand logo features a seahorse, a symbol of exploration found in Greek mythology and Roman bath ceramics. The deep blue hue of our bottles mirrors the depths of the ocean and Mediterranean Sea.

Proudly made in Italy, Acque di Italia embraces sustainability with recycled packaging and clean formulas enriched with natural ingredients. Dermatologically tested, our gentle formulations ensure a harmonious experience for your skin.
acque-di-italia.quote: Acque di Italia, where ancient rituals and moments of serenity intertwine to unlock a world of refined beauty and wellbeing

affinessence.lead: In the world of luxury fragrances, Affinessence is rewriting the rules. Breaking barriers and pushing boundaries, Affinessence has successfully blended freshness and flamboyance with the enduring qualities that define their brand: intensity, longevity, and exceptional trails.
affinessence.story:
For Sophie Bruneau, the founder of Affinessence, perfume has always been a passion that fuels her artistic spirit. With over 25 years of experience in the perfume and cosmetics industry, Sophie brings her expertise and olfactory sensitivity to every fragrance they introduce.

In 2013, she founded Affinessence, a perfume consultancy company that offers a range of services, from marketing strategies to turnkey product development. In 2015, Sophie's dream became a reality with the launch of The Base Notes Collection. This collection represents the culmination of her passion and conviction, combining audacious 'base-focused' perfumes with unparalleled quality. Introducing the so-called exclusive 'freshness diamonds,' where freshness and luxury intertwine to create a truly unique olfactory experience.

Affinessence is committed to merging luxury and sustainable development. By prioritizing reusable packaging, such as their exquisite lacquered wooden boxes and cashmere pouches that add a touch of elegance when traveling, the company demonstrates their dedication. The products are designed with responsible materials, from recyclable foams to FSC-certified cardboard.

Affinessence fragrances are more than just scents; they are works of art that offer a genuine 'sensual signature.' Multi-faceted yet linear, their perfumes possess an unmistakable presence that lingers long after they are applied.
affinessence.quote: From regressive notes that evoke childhood memories to comforting accords that wrap you in a sense of security, Affinessence perfumes exude warmth and evoke powerful emotions

calaj.tagline: Made with soul, not with a machine
calaj.lead:
Calaj Perfumes is an artisanal niche perfume house based in Arad, Romania, founded in 2020.

With a deep passion for the art of perfumery, Calaj aims to bring exclusive perfumes and limited editions to all the lovers of this art. Rejecting mass production, each Calaj perfume is meticulously crafted in collaboration with world-famous perfumers, ensuring a unique olfactory experience.
calaj.story:
Flavius Călaj, the founder of Calaj Perfumes, established the brand in 2020 with a vision to create extraordinary fragrances that transcend the ordinary. As an artisanal niche perfume house, Calaj takes pride in producing perfumes in small batches, limited editions, with a maximum of 100 bottles. This exclusivity ensures that each fragrance is a true olfactory masterpiece.

Collaborating with renowned perfumers like Miguel Matos, winner of The Art and Olfaction Awards 2020, Calaj Perfumes combines expertise and artistic craftsmanship. The perfumes are customized in the most artistic ways, with attention to detail and handmade production by local small companies. Only the finest and most exquisite ingredients are used, guaranteeing a luxurious and sensorial experience.

Calaj Perfumes believes in the soulful creation of fragrances, emphasizing the human touch over mechanical processes. With a commitment to craftsmanship, each perfume is a labor of love, infused with passion and dedication. The result is a collection of exceptional scents that resonate with the discerning fragrance connoisseurs.
calaj.quote: With a commitment to craftsmanship, each perfume is a labor of love, infused with passion and dedication
